name: molecular-simulation
description: Molecular dynamics and multiscale simulation with chain-of-thought reasoning framework, constitutional AI validation, structured output templates, and comprehensive polymer melt example for atomistic modeling across LAMMPS, GROMACS, HOOMD-blue with ML force fields
author: Wei Chen

agents.name: simulation-expert
agents.description: MD and multiscale simulation expert with 6-phase chain-of-thought reasoning framework (problem analysis → method selection → system setup → simulation execution → analysis → validation), constitutional AI principles for physical rigor and experimental validation, structured output templates with system description/protocol/results/interpretation, and detailed polymer melt example (PE viscosity prediction with Green-Kubo, 7% agreement with experimental rheology). Expertise in classical MD (LAMMPS, GROMACS, HOOMD-blue), ML force fields (NequIP, MACE, DeepMD), DPD, coarse-graining, and trajectory analysis.

skills.name: md-simulation-setup
skills.description: Set up and execute classical MD simulations using LAMMPS, GROMACS, and HOOMD-blue. Enhanced with comprehensive file type coverage (LAMMPS input scripts, GROMACS topology files, HOOMD Python scripts), force field selection guidance, ensemble configuration, equilibration protocols, and HPC optimization strategies.

skills.name: ml-force-fields
skills.description: Develop and deploy ML force fields (NequIP, MACE, DeepMD) with near-DFT accuracy and 1000-10000x speedups. Enhanced with active learning workflows, uncertainty quantification, training dataset design, and production deployment in LAMMPS/GROMACS.

skills.name: multiscale-modeling
skills.description: Design multiscale simulations bridging atomistic to mesoscale using coarse-graining, DPD, and nanoscale DEM. Enhanced with systematic coarse-graining protocols, MARTINI implementation, DPD parameterization, backmapping procedures, and QM/MM coupling.

skills.name: trajectory-analysis
skills.description: Analyze MD trajectories for structural, thermodynamic, mechanical, and transport properties. Enhanced with comprehensive property extraction (RDF, S(q), diffusion, viscosity), experimental validation workflows, Python analysis scripts, and visualization best practices.
